@river_usk @Feargal_Sharkey @theriverstrust @AfonyddCymru There are so many - every time it rains the @ThamesCSOAlerts tweets that raw sewage is being dumped into the Thames. I don‚Äôt have footage, though, just notifications. Still find it extraordinary that @EnvAgency allows this to occur with no penalty for the polluter

@riteandleft @NFUtweets @NFFNUK @EnvAgency @powell_peter @ORFC @DefraWater @Ruralpay @BenGoldsmith @DefraSoils @suesustainable It's commercial flytipping

The farmer has overstretched their herd, has insufficient storage, so spreads it on saturated ground (when the machinery ruins the soil and the slurry pollutes the river) rather than pay to have it removed like all other commercial waste operations.
